Container.Name: binhex-gonic
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D
Container.Overview: Free-software subsonic server API implementation, supporting its many clients.

Config.Name: Port: Web Interface
Config.Description: This is the port for the Web UI for the application

Config.Name: Path: /config
Config.Description: This is the container path to your configuration files, e.g. databases, configuration files, logs etc.

Config.Name: Path: /media
Config.Description: This is the container path to your media files, e.g. movies, tv, music, pictures etc.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_COMMAND
Config.Description: The command or script to execute, if not specified then the script healthcheck.sh will be used (process, dns and https checking).

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_ACTION
Config.Description: The action to execute if the healthcheck command returns a non zero exit code, if not specified the action will be 'exit 1', if you want the container to exit on failure then set the action to 'kill 1'.

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTHCHECK_HOSTNAME
Config.Description: The hostname used when performing HTTPS and DNS healthchecking.

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for the running container

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for the running container
